sentences.en: "After you." — "Not at all, Mr Bird, after you."
sentences.cn: “您先请。”——“别客气，伯德先生，您先请。”

sentences.en: a flock of birds
sentences.cn: 一群飞鸟

sentences.en: a little bird told me it was your birthday.
sentences.cn: 有人告诉我那天是你的生日。

sentences.en: a wooden bird cage
sentences.cn: 木制鸟笼

sentences.en: Among the most spectacular sights are the great sea-bird colonies.
sentences.cn: 庞大的海鸟群是最壮观的景象之一。

sentences.en: At one point a bird trilled in the Conservatory.
sentences.cn: 有那么一刻，一只鸟儿在温室里啼叫。

sentences.en: Early bird discounts are usually available at the beginning of the season.
sentences.cn: 在换季之初抢先购买通常会有折扣优惠。

sentences.en: He was trying to keep out of the bird's line of sight.
sentences.cn: 他试图躲到那只鸟看不到的地方。

sentences.en: mothering's for the birds.
sentences.cn: 养育孩子的事情不值得去考虑。

sentences.en: Put stuffing into the cavity and truss the bird.
sentences.cn: 把填料放到腔内，把鸟的腿和翅膀扎紧。

sentences.en: Researchers observed one bird impale a rodent on a cactus.
sentences.cn: 研究人员观察到一只鸟把一只啮齿动物钉在一棵仙人掌上。

sentences.en: The bird continued to warble.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿继续啁啾。

sentences.en: The bird flew away.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿飞走了。

sentences.en: The bird had trouble breathing and was discharging blood from the nostrils.
sentences.cn: 那只鸟呼吸困难，并且鼻孔里还在流血。

sentences.en: The bird stopped and hovered in mid-air.
sentences.cn: 鸟儿停了下来，在半空中盘旋。

sentences.en: The bird-watchers crept about in the bushes.
sentences.cn: 观鸟者在灌木丛中蹑手蹑脚地走来走去。

sentences.en: The dawn was filled with the sound of birds.
sentences.cn: 黎明时分，鸟鸣声不绝于耳。

sentences.en: The sand martin is a brown bird with white underneath.
sentences.cn: 崖沙燕是一种褐羽白腹的鸟。

sentences.en: these health professionals sure were birds of a feather.
sentences.cn: 这些保健专业人员当然属于同一类人。

sentences.en: They warned him that next time he'd find himself doing bird.
sentences.cn: 他们警告他下次他可能就要进监狱了。

sentences.en: TV pictures showed a dying bird coated with oil.
sentences.cn: 电视画面上出现了一只身上沾满油污、奄奄一息的小鸟。

sentences.en: wild birds
sentences.cn: 野鸟

phrases.phrase: a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush

phrases.tran_cn: (幽默)［用于表示说话者不愿透露向其提供消息者为何人］有人跟我说

phrases.phrase: birds of a feather flock together
flip someone the bird (或 flip the bird)
phrases.tran_cn: 向某人竖中指（表示轻蔑或愤怒）
(英， 非正式)嘘某人，喝某人倒彩；嘲弄某人
[美国俚语](电视节目)可以从卫星频道收看的
要找的人逃走（或离开）了
(非正式)（讲给儿童听的）性启蒙知识

trans.tran_en: a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs
a creature with wings and feathers that can usually fly. Many birds sing and build nests, and female birds lay eggs
